means: 隆美尔（姓氏； Erwin, 1891-1944，纳粹德国陆军元帅，二次世界大战时任北非战场德军司令官，后以图谋推翻希特勒，被逼自杀）

sentence.Network_en: Now I understand that Rommel is expected to attack at any moment.
sentence.Network_cn: 我现在知道,隆美尔随时会发动进攻.

sentence.Network_en: Rommel put on his cap and got out of the car.
sentence.Network_cn: 隆美尔戴上帽子,从车子里走了出来.

sentence.Network_en: Rommel is not done yet, but we have regained the initiative.
sentence.Network_cn: 隆美尔还没有完蛋, 但是我觉得我们已获得了主动权.

means.word_mean: 1. German field marshal noted for brilliant generalship in North Africa during World War II (1891-1944)

auth_sentence.content: Rommel's spell of invincibility was broken.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rommel's spell of invincibility was broken.

auth_sentence.content: In 1942, British troops defeated the Germans under General Rommel at El Alamein after a 12-day battle.
auth_sentence.res_content: In 1942, British troops defeated the Germans under General Rommel at El Alamein after a 12-day battle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In 1942, British troops defeated the Germans under General Rommel at El Alamein after a 12-day battle.

auth_sentence.content: Rommel knew that a major attack was inevitable, and did his best to prepare for it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rommel knew that a major attack was inevitable, and did his best to prepare for it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rommel knew that a major attack was inevitable, and did his best to prepare for it.
